short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses real-time webcam footage to accurately detect bad posture and warn user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revolutionize your desk time with PostureCorrector, a Chrome extension that turns your webcam into an accurate posture detector. Using advanced real-time detection, PostureCorrector keeps you sitting tall and feeling great, all day long.

üöÄ Key Features:

- Smart Posture Detection:  Harness the power of your webcam for real-time posture analysis.
- Customizable Experience:  Choose your preferred webcam and tailor frame processing speed to your device's capabilities.
- Gentle Reminders:  Get notified when bad posture is detected through subtle tab blurring or desktop notifications.
- Comprehensive Analytics:  Gain deep insights into your posture habits with a wide range of detailed statistics and trends.


üõ°Ô∏è Your Privacy, Our Priority:

- 100% Open Source:  The entire codebase is publicly accessible for your review and peace of mind. Find the link on the extension's website.
- Local Processing:  All computations happen right on your device - your data never leaves your computer.
- Offline Functionality:  No external servers, no data transmission - just you and better posture.


üìä Unlock Your Posture Potential:

PostureCorrector provides a wealth of statistics to help you understand and improve your posture:

- Track your longest streak of perfect posture
- Analyze your lowest and highest bad posture percentages
- View bad posture percentage for the last 120 days
- Explore average bad posture percentages for each 3-hour time window (12am - 3am, 3am - 6am, ..., 9pm - 12am)
- Compare performance across work, study, and entertainment activities
- Discover trends and patterns in your posture habits over time

Don't let poor posture hold you back. Install PostureCorrector now and take the first step towards a healthier lifestyle. Your back will thank you!
